General.Name: Bermaz Auto Bhd
General.Description: Bermaz Auto Berhad, an investment holding company, distributes and retails of new and used Mazda, Peugeot, and Kia vehicles in Malaysia and the Philippines. The company assembles completely knocked-down vehicles and distributes built-up units; and provides after-sales services and automotive spare parts, showrooms, as well as accessories for Mazda, Peugeot, and Kia vehicles. It operates branches through the sales, spare parts, after-sales services centers, and dealer centers. The company was formerly known as Berjaya Auto Berhad and changed its name to Bermaz Auto Berhad in October 2016. Bermaz Auto Berhad was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia.
